tweet.text: hpstorageguy thanks for all the info really dissatisfied with hps documentation efforts re p9000vsphere only finding lefthand3pareva
hpstorageguy host mode 01 vmware or 21 vmware extension hds says enable options 54 extended copys63 vstorage apist10 stds
chouse 54 is if you only have esx41 attachedswant vaai enabled 63 is for esxi5 if both sharing same host group 63 takes precedence
hpstorageguy only esxi5 so only need hmo 63 what about 40 vvol expansion
chouse there is hmo 69 which returns a unit attention when lun capacity is expanded that applies to all host modes
